title: Definitions
context: C. Disposition to Victims of Natural Disaster 1. disposition for other than residential or agricultural purposes ยง171-85 Definitions. As used in this part III C: &ldquo;Disaster area&rdquo; means an area proclaimed by the governor to be a disaster area. &ldquo;Natural disaster&rdquo; means any disaster caused by seismic or tidal wave, tsunami, hurricane, volcanic eruption, typhoon, earthquake, or flood. &ldquo;Person&rdquo; means an individual (citizen and noncitizen), partnership, corporation, and association. [L 1962, c 32, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง103A-80; HRS ยง171-85] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted.
